channel.title: [317] PaleScape v1 [blank/semi-blank source]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I do believe this is my first release, two or three days ago I downloaded a """blank""" source, login messages pop up, commands, starter items, new spawn, tons of just stuff that you don't need and are obviously leeched, so I took that and decided to make something that I could and would want to start a new server off of.
I would like to introduce you to PaleScape: - (should be) removed skills except for basic range/mage/attack/hitpoints - fixed a few bugs in the source I downloaded - hopefully removed all the BS (thousands of lines) - removed all commands (there are 3 or 4 that I was using for testing purposes) - most doors/stairs/etc don't work, some due for review if you wanna add it to the rest (or delete and make your own) - removed most of the teleports - more (or less?)
All in all for this I shortened (in client.java) 31548 lines (of a 'blank' source) to 22987 lines (and that's with commenting out some of the stuff I thought could be used for review later on) I just made this in a few days (reviewing code, learning some stuff, removing), so don't expect it to be perfect. I do not know if this counts as leeching, and if it does I will gladly remove this topic.
Well, I'm not sure if anyone will find this useful and/or anyone will use this, but I tried :)
http://www.multiupload.com/KPITZIG0W3
Credits: Whoever made the original source (no way I could find out it's been leeched so much, though I read xerocheese or someone a lot in the code)

@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

[quote=“Decysp, post:8, topic:414112”]F A I L S. Gtfo… I don’t see you releasing anything. If you hate it, leave. Simple as that. No need to be a brat about it.

Nice work though, Walkineagle.[/quote]First of all, it’s called criticism, second of all can’t really tell someone to “GTFO” a thread, if you can’t handle the criticism don’t release anything. I told him what i know from my knowledge on blank sources. So don’t be telling me to “Gtfo” When i’m sure others want pictures to.

item.title: [317] PaleScape v1 [blank/semi-blank source]
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

I fixed a few bugs and released a semi blank source I would be happy starting off a server with, and by that I mean one in which when you login you don’t get spammed with login screens, messages, commands, items, teleporters, npcs, shops, shitty dialogue, etc, and I removed entire skills (sometimes commenting out important parts for review) so the user can write their own. I wanted to make a somewhat blank source in which someone can make a half decent server out of. If you don’t like it, that’s very much fine, but this is my first release and I never expected lots of people to like or download it, but I decided to release it because I thought maybe even just one person would find it semi useful, I didn’t know that wasn’t approved upon here.

Also, by your theory you could say about any program:
“Basically you just opened up Eclipse and added code, everyone does that!”

Read full topic

item.title: [317] PaleScape v1 [blank/semi-blank source]
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

Hey guys, I do believe this is my first release, two or three days ago I downloaded a “”“blank”"" source, login messages pop up, commands, starter items, new spawn, tons of just stuff that you don’t need and are obviously leeched, so I took that and decided to make something that I could and would want to start a new server off of.

I would like to introduce you to PaleScape:

  • (should be) removed skills except for basic range/mage/attack/hitpoints
  • fixed a few bugs in the source I downloaded
  • hopefully removed all the BS (thousands of lines)
  • removed all commands (there are 3 or 4 that I was using for testing purposes)
  • most doors/stairs/etc don’t work, some due for review if you wanna add it to the rest (or delete and make your own)
  • removed most of the teleports
  • more (or less?)

All in all for this I shortened (in client.java) 31548 lines (of a ‘blank’ source) to 22987 lines (and that’s with commenting out some of the stuff I thought could be used for review later on)
I just made this in a few days (reviewing code, learning some stuff, removing), so don’t expect it to be perfect.
I do not know if this counts as leeching, and if it does I will gladly remove this topic.

Well, I’m not sure if anyone will find this useful and/or anyone will use this, but I tried
